name: roytang
text:
@cblgh hi, sorry to necro this thread, but I was having some server load issues recently, and I found an unusually large number of hits from user agent "Lieu". I have temporarily blocked that user agent and it seems to have stabilized my server load.

It's a bit weird because I checked and my domain is still on [the filtered list](https://lieu.cblgh.org/filtered). As an example, the attached image shows a 24-hour access log from like 10 days ago; 294k requests from Lieu out of 341k total!
